data.author: Jori Seidel

changelog.release_notes: Fixed an issue where the time could be displayed like 11:?? (font was a bit too large). Added an AM/PM indicator when using the 12h clock display and made the date label a bit higher so the comma is fully displayed.
Bolder time font for better readability and added a comma after the day abbreviation.

data.description:
Easy Time is a watchface that lets you read the time with ease! How often does someone ask you the time and you look at your precious Pebble Time and you see 11:17 and have say eeh, it's 11:15!? Easy Time truncates the time in five minute blocks and shows 9 bars (on the top and bottom) which will indicate the exact minute, so you can still see what time it is exactly with ease :)

The watchface shows the approximate time, the actual minutes (in bars), the date (with abbreviated day name) and the battery percentage of your Pebble Time.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed an issue where the time could be displayed like 11:?? (font was a bit too large). Added an AM/PM indicator when using the 12h clock display and made the date label a bit higher so the comma is fully displayed.

data.title: Easy Time
